page.title: 18NORRIS GREEN,LIVERPOOL
page.content: PEOPLE HAVE BEEN MOVING INTO NORRIS GREEN FOR THE LAST FIFTY YEARS. LIVERPOOL'S POPULATION ABOUT FIFTY YEARS AGO WAS TREMENDOUSLY HIGH AND IT KEPT ON GROWING.BUT THEN IT HAD THE PROBLEM OF NOT ENOUGH HOUSES SO A LOT OF PEOLE MOVED INTO THE OUTSKIRTS, INCLUDING NORRIS GREEN. PEOPLE HAVE MOVED INTO {NORRIS GREEN FROM PLACES LIKE{HUYTON, KIRKBY, {MANCHESTER AND WALTON.}PEOPLE USED TO POUR IN.NOW HARDLY ANYONE MOVES INTO NORRIS GREEN BECAUSE OF {VANDALISM } AND {BURGLARY }PLUS {LITTER }AND {UNTIDINESS.}PEOPLE STILL MOVE IN BUT NOT MANY.PEOPLE HAVE MOVED OUT OF NORRIS GREEN BECAUSE OF {NEIGHBOUR {PROBLEMS }AND {LACK OF MONEY.}NORRIS GREEN IS NOT A NEW AREA{.THREE {QUARTERS OF THE FAMILIES HAVE LIVED {HERE FOR OVER TWENTY YEARS.
